overview: "Exodus to Dimension 11" is the story of Adrian (Salisbury), a man traveling through dimensions looking for his true love, Lavinya (Baxi). In his journey, he finds himself in a dimensional world he is unfamiliar with: it is a cold, snowy world, inhabited by lifeless tress and machines. He must battle the elements, the harsh world and its inhabitants, in his struggle to find his true love.
title: Exodus to Dimension 11
